name: LTFilter+LMPQSelect Results (L=10)
description: Results from LTFilter tournament filtering with L=10, followed by LMPQSelect.

bier_result_unsorted_{p}_{x}_{num_querie.description: Unsorted top-K results after LTFilter + LMPQSelect

columns.did: Stringified list of top-K document IDs

note: L parameter controls tournament filter aggressiveness. Lower L = more aggressive filtering = faster but potentially lower recall.
